lemma bisimTransitiveCoinduct[case_names cSim cSym, case_conclusion bisim step, consumes 2]: assumes "(P, Q) \<in> X" and "eqvt X" and rSim: "\<And>R S. (R, S) \<in> X \<Longrightarrow> R \<leadsto>[(bisim O (X \<union> bisim) O bisim)] S" and rSym: "\<And>R S. (R, S) \<in> X \<Longrightarrow> (S, R) \<in> bisim O (X \<union> bisim) O bisim" shows "P \<sim> Q"
